summary: Owing to the wrongdoings affiliated with evils similar to black money, an honest but ferocious police officer returns as the Deputy Commissioner of Police with the prospect of wiping out injustice.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Kareena Kapoor|Amole Gupte|Anupam Kher|Dayanand Shetty|Sharat Saxena|Vineet Sharma|Mahesh Manjrekar|Sonalee Kulkarni|Zakir Hussain|Ashwini Kalsekar|Govind Namdeo|Meghna Vaidya|Pankaj Tripathi|Uday Tikekar|Naushaad Abbas|Sameer Dharmadhikari|Kunal Gupta|Uttam Halder|Pompy Hans|Trushant Ingle|Jitendra Joshi|Sarita Joshi|Chhaya Kadam|Ajaz Khan|Abhishek Khanna|Shubhangi Latkar|Sachin Nayak|Tahoor Qadri|Deep Raj Rana|Natasha Rana|Santosh Shetty|Ujjawal Gauraha Shiva|Shriswara|Amritpal Singh|Yo Yo Honey Singh|Smita Tambe|Olivia M Williams|Ganesh Yadav
title: Singham Returns
